{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Nitrogen6x freescale imx6 development board.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Nitrogen6X - Embedded Single Board Computer |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://boundarydevices.com/product/nitrogen6x/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Boundary_Devices_Nitrogen6X |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Boundary Devices |model = Nitrogen |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = 6X |revision = REV3 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer, development board |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Freescale (NXP);i.MX6Q;MCIMX6Q6AVT10C; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A9 |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- 1.0 / 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SST;SST25VF016B; |flash1size = 2 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Micron;MT41K256M16HA-125:E; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Micrel;KSZ9021RN; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:19:B8 |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = SATA II, USB 2.0, Mini PCIe |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_sata_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_poe_type = ns |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 10-pin header,, populated,, J13 |jtag = yes,, 6-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, J17
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 2.1, HDMI 1.4, LVDS, MIPI DSI, MIPI CSI, CSI, RTC, Audio 3.5mm out, MicroSD Card slot, |addchip = 3-port USB Hub Controller;SMSC;USB2513B;;1;,,, I2C Real Time Clock;Intersil;ISL1208;;1;,,, Low Power Stereo Codec;Freescale Semiconductor;SGTL5000;;1;,,, Dual RS-232 Transmitter/Receiver;Intersil;ISL3232E;;1;,,, High speed CAN transceiver;NXP;TJA1040;;1;,,, Fixed Current-Limiting Power-Distribution Switch;ON Semi;NCP382;;2;,,, 1A, 1.5MHz PWM Step-Down DC/DC Converter;Richtek;RT8010;;1;,,, 4A, 2MHz Step-Down Converter;Richtek;RT8070;;3;,,, Programmable-Delay Supervisory Circuit;Texas Instruments;TPS3808;;1;,,, Octal Buffer and Line Driver;NXP;SN74LVC244A;;1;,,, 3-Terminal Positive Adjustable Regulator;National Semiconductor;LM317;;1;,,, 8-Bit Bidirectional Level-Shifting Voltage Translator;TI;TXS0108E;;1;,,, 1.2V 600mA CMOS LDO;Diodes Inc;AP7217D;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = Debian, Ubuntu, Arch Linux (Arm), QNX, Windows Embedded, Android 9,
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 03/2012 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = 114 x 76 mm |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = LSR TiWi-BLE |rad1modif = SDIO (module) |rad1chip1 = Texas Instruments;WL1271L; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *CPU: ''[[NXP]]'' i.MX6Q ''Quad'' (MCIMX6Q6AVT10C) :@1GHz Quad-Core (ARM Cortex A9) *GPU: ''Vivante'' GC2000 / GC320 :Video decoding 1080p60 H.264 *RAM: 1GB (DDR3) @533MHz *Storage: 2MB (SPI), SATA, Dual MicroSD (TF) Card *Video Output: Parallel RGB, LVDS and HDMI *Audio Output: Analog via 3.5mm *WiFi & BT: [[LSR TiWi-BLE]], BT 2.1 *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet *USB: 2x USB 2.0, 1x USB (OTG) *PCIe 2.0 Daughter board (J23) *Power: 5V/2A barrel, PoE *Dimensions (L x W): 114 x 76mm
==Links of Interest== *([https://boundarydevices.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/Nitrogen6X-e1550281048735.png PCB REV4]) *[https://archlinuxarm.org/platforms/armv7/freescale/nitrogen6x ''Nitrogen6X'' on '''ArchLinux|ARM''' Wiki]
===News=== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2012/02/29/boundary-devices-unveils-nitrogen6x-freescale-i-mx6-development-kit-aka-i-mx6q-sabre-lite/ ''Boundary Devices Unveils Nitrogen6X Freescale i.MX6 Development Kit'' on '''CNX-Software'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2012/02/24/low-cost-freescale-imx6-quad-sabre-lite-development-board/ ''Low Cost Freescale iMX6 Quad Sabre Lite Development Board'' on '''CNX|Software'''] :''Freescale i.MX6 Development Kit (i.MX6Q Sabre Lite)''
